body.p:
To his Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky.

The undersigned petitioners represent That Martin Skain was tried in the Lexington City Court. for an assault upon Matthew McNamara. and was fined $20. besides costs, amounting to $17 -- There was no battery proved in the case. McNamara had just before the said assault was committed, beat. and shot a friend of the Defendant Skain_ and it was this circumstance that led him to commit the assault_ He is a peaceable man and in very moderate circumstances_ and the costs amount to a sufficient punishment

Benj F Graves
T. L. Price
W Payne
James B Beck
M B Johman
Chas R Thomas
James B Clay

Lexington City Ct
$20. } Assault
Martin Skain
